interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Lucifer: The Complete First Season [DVD] Review Date: 2017/07/04 Store: Tom Ellis (Actor), Lauren German (Actor), Len Wiseman (Director) & 0 more Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Drama Product Description: ['Lucifer: The Complete First Season (DVD)', 'Bored and unhappy as the Lord of Hell, Lucifer has resigned his throne and retired to the City of Angels, where he is indulging in a few of his favorite things — wine, women, song. When a beautiful pop star is brutally murdered before his eyes, he feels something awaken deep within him – for the first time in roughly 10 billion years. Is he actually capable of feelings for a human being? The very thought disturbs him — as well as his best friend and confidante, Mazikeen (aka Maze), a fierce demon in the form of a beautiful young woman. The murder attracts the attention of LAPD homicide detective Chloe Dancer, who finds herself both repulsed and fascinated by Lucifer. As they work together to solve the murder, Lucifer is struck by Chloe’s inherent goodness. Used to dealing with the absolute worst of humanity, he begins to wonder if there’s hope yet. Maybe everyone’s got a chance for redemption. Even the Devil.', ']]>'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Science Fiction & Fantasy, Drama', 'Format': 'Dolby, DVD, NTSC, Subtitled, AC-3', 'Contributor': 'Len Wiseman, Jonathan Littman, Jerry Bruckheimer, Tom Ellis, Lauren German', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Number Of Discs': '3', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': '35645241', 'Director': 'Len Wiseman', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, DVD, NTSC, Subtitled, AC-3', 'Run time': '9 hours and 20 minutes', 'Release date': 'August 23, 2016', 'Actors': 'Tom Ellis, Lauren German', 'Subtitles': 'French', 'Producers': 'Jerry Bruckheimer, Jonathan Littman', 'Studio': 'Studio Distribution Services', 'Number of discs': '3'} Review Text: This is my favorite tv show of all time....and I'm no spring chicken.....I love to watch the devil learn and become more human(at times)....can't wait for season 2!
My package arrived on time and packaged nicely... Review Title: Love Lucifer! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Basic Samuel Jackson (Actor), John Travolta (Actor), John McTiernan (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles ['Academy Award(r) nominees John Travolta (Best Actor in a Leading Role, Pulp Fiction, 1994) and SamuelL. Jackson (Best Actor in a Supporting Role, Pulp Fiction, 1994) team up with action director John McTiernan (Die Hard, The Hunt for Red October, Predator) in a white-knuckle "thrill ride with a twist you won\'t believe!" (MairiAnna Bachynsky, ATV/CTV ENTERTAINMENT) Also starring Connie Nielsen (TheHunted, Gladiator), Giovanni Ribisi (Gone in Sixty Seconds), Brian Van Holt (Black Hawk Down), TayeDiggs (Chicago) and Roselyn Sanchez (Rush Hour 2). A DEA officer (Travolta) is recruited to investigate the mysterious disappearance of a famed U.S. Army drill instructor (Jackson) and a group of cadets on a routine military exercise in the jungles of Panama. But the journey to uncover the truth leads to some dangerous and unexpected places when two rescued survivors tell dramatically different versions of what transpired. "Totally mesmerizing." profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Media Preferences:** The user exhibits a strong inclination towards action, thriller, and drama genres with a particular affinity for narratives involving supernatural elements and character development, as indicated by their enjoyment of series that explore complex relationships and personal growth.
  
- **Favorite Actors/Directors:** Continues to appreciate performances from well-known actors and directors, favoring those who contribute to memorable and engaging stories.

- **Format Preference:** Maintains a preference for physical media formats, specifically DVDs, reflecting a commitment to building a tangible collection.

- **Review Patterns:** Has a history of rating products highly (5 stars) when satisfied, indicating definite enjoyment and a strong likelihood of recommending similar content. The user consistently expresses enthusiasm in their reviews.

- **Emotional Engagement:** Describes experiences with a sense of love and emotional connection, showcasing a deep appreciation for the storytelling.

- **Longstanding Loyalty:** Since their initial interaction in 2017, the user has shown consistent engagement with entertainment media over time.

- **Interaction Depth:** Prefers writing concise and enthusiastic reviews that convey genuine enjoyment, emphasizing appreciation for quality storytelling and character development.

Overall, the user's profile reflects a passionate engagement with emotionally resonant narratives, particularly in the drama and action genres, while valuing the physicality of media collections.
